properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 14th November 2023** **Open from 21-11-23. Our space is ideal to work in, or enjoy some quiet space. We will not be running any programmes during warm welcome hours. However, if you need someone to chat to, our Chaplain will be on site, and you can request time with him.

properties.description: Tea and Coffee. Food available from community fridge.
